name: tm45
effect: Teaches Attract to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Attract to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Thunder Wave)

flavor_text.sun-moon: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.
